class.name: OpenXRFutureResult
class.brief_description: Result object tracking the asynchronous result of an OpenXR Future object.
class.description: Result object tracking the asynchronous result of an OpenXR Future object, you can use this object to track the result status.

method.name: cancel_future
method.description: Cancel this future, this will interrupt and stop the asynchronous function.

method.name: get_future
method.description: Return the [code]XrFutureEXT[/code] value this result relates to.

method.name: get_status
method.description: Returns the status of this result.

signal.name: completed
signal.description: Emitted when the asynchronous function is finished or has been cancelled.

constants.constant: The asynchronous function has been cancelled.
